name: Harbinger 2: The Void
overview: Stardate – 2800.7 On route to Maginellic System You have escaped from the Tantalus System and disabled the Convergence Iniciative, but your ship was damaged by a gravitational anomaly named “The Void” , inside … you discover a new threat to the star cluster. A space pirates group armed with Tau weapons … and only a Harbinger operative to stop them.
